text: Bayerotrochus boucheti is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Pleurotomariidae. ;Subspecies: * Bayerotrochus boucheti boucheti (Anseeuw & Poppe, 2001) * Bayerotrochus boucheti mirificus Anseeuw, 2016 ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 60 mm and 70 mm. ==Distribution== This marine species occurs off Norfolk Ridge, New Caledonia. ==References== * Anseeuw P. & Poppe G. (2001). Description of Perotrochus boucheti sp. nov. from the South Pacific (Gastropoda: Pleurotomariidae). Novapex 2(4): 125-131 * Anseeuw P. (2016). Two new pleurotomariid subspecies from the South Pacific (Gastropoda: Pleurotomariidae). Visaya. 4(5): 43-57 ==External links== * Category:Pleurotomariidae Category:Gastropods described in 2001
title: Bayerotrochus boucheti
